original_text: But God had chosen me to serve him even before I was born. He chose me to be his servant because he is very kind.
korean_text: 그러나 내 어머니의 태로부터 나를 택정하시고 그의 은혜로 나를 부르신 이가

sentences.original_text: But God had chosen me to serve him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하나님은 내가 그를 섬기도록 나를 택하셨고

sentences.original_text: He chose me to be his servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 그의 종이 되도록 나를 택하셨고
